website_summaries.verdict: Known for its easy clean-up and prevention of ingrown hairs, this affordable epilator is the best bargain around.
pros: Contains 72 silver ion tweezers with antimicrobial properties
cons: The heads generate heat, so caution should be used when repetitively targeting specific areas of the body

customer_reviews.title: Works great until the head breaks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this epilator about 22 months ago, and it's been great. Just broke and is unusable now though. The machine still powers on, but the tweezer heads grind and no longer rotate. Used 2x/month for 40min/session. 3 stars for a solid product for the first year (it would start to grind and pop but still work since then) but don't expect the last epilator you'll ever have to buy. Fyi: Unit comes with a brush, but there is NO way to clean behind the head easily, so it's kind of a joke. Video: noise the epilator started making (loud) with proof that it no longer works at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Boyle

customer_reviews.title: This item is garbage. In less then a month it started failing ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is garbage. In less then a month it started failing in performance. It started with a intermittent clicking noise. The clicking increased and then it finally stopped rotating when pressed against the skin. For the very short time that it did work, I was impressed. But, what is the point of good performance if it doesn't last. I would request a replacement, but I don't even want another one of these devices.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I had family members that raved about this product. That's why I bought it. However, as you can see from the picture, it pulled out very few hairs but managed to break many and even damaged my skin. Perhaps it works better on other parts of the body, but I bought it specifically for my face and neck where it has proven to be horrible. I hope that I do not get hair bumps from using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to reach your backside.
customer_reviews.text: While this things works like a charm. It occurs to me that the people who designed these things don't use them. It would be GREAT if there was a 4 inch handle and a 90 degree tweezer head. It would be so easy then to reach behind you. Otherwise this thing works great. if you use it only loose skin or wrinkly skin (you know where I'm talking about) then you have to pull the skin taut. then it won't pinch. It's scary to put those teeth on your "sensitive parts" but it doesn't pinch me. Follow directions and open the pores up first and then spray some aftertreatment (witchhazel and rubbing alcohol) and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: TommyLem

customer_reviews.title: Works well while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I'm on Amazon to buy a new epilator, and decided to review my old one. I bought the Emjoi less than a year ago after reading all the reviews about how quickly this thing breaks. I figure I went in to my purchase fully aware of what I was buying, so I'm giving 3 stars. It does break easily, just as everyone says. It has 2 tiny little plastic gears, one in the head and one in the body, and eventually one of the teeth on the plastic gear will break. I estimate used my epilator less than 20 times before it broke. While it does work, it does its job very well. No complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: MessyDogOwner

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic parts. Broke in less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: This product would be great if they replaced the plastic gears with a more durable material. I purchased this on 2/8 and it was damaged and not functional by the end of April. I primarily used this on facial hair (majority peach fuzz with a few course hairs here and there) and once a week at max. There is a reason they only offer a 30 day satisfaction guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Joyce

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT LAST!!!  Critical internal gears are plastic and break.
customer_reviews.text: Only worked a couple months. Worked great until it broke. I made the mistake and bought a 2nd one hoping it was just a fluke. Company would or could not repair, or send replacement gears. The gears should be metal. Buy a Braun 9000 series and you'll be much happier. It will last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using epilators for many years and needed a new one when my previous one broke. I researched and read reviews and decided to buy this one, hoping that the higher quantity of tweezers would speed up how long it takes to do my legs. After using this for several months, I can say that I haven't been overly impressed with this epilator. It takes just as long as it did with fewer tweezers and the larger size makes it harder to do my underarms. If I could return this for a different one, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: A very “ cheap” quality for an expensive product !
customer_reviews.text: Overrated price , overrated quality! Actually a very “cheap “ quality for an expensive product! I have been using epilators for more than 20 years but only used Braun, every single onebgenerations. When it came the time for a new one, I chose this one because of the reviews. It showed a nice design, dual opposite twizzers (speed) at a “discount “ price! I hoped it would be a good product. But, IT wasn’t!!!! Cheap material, very noisy motor, cheap quality as a metal and doesn’t pluck anything on any speed just shaving hair ....NOT worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was my second epilator purchase. I use it mainly on my forearms. I was very pleased initially with the Braun epilator but it seemed to stop pulling as much hair out and after 3-4 months so I decided to try this Emoji AP-18. I was very disappointed in this purchase. Even brand new it didn't pull anywhere close to the amount of hair that the older Braun does. I used it a few times and was so disappointed that I put it away and got the Braun back out and am using it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: What a difference! No pain at all!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using an epilator for about 5 years now on both my legs and underarms. The last one I had was a cheaper Remmington model with only 40 tweezers. It was fine for my legs, but was painful for my underarms (still worth not shaving though). Well, it finally broke and I hated spending more than $50 on an epilator. After reading tons of reviews, I decided to give this one a try. Oh WOW! No pain at all - anywhere! I am thrilled and satisfied that every penny was well spent! Easy to use, plug and go, and once more...no pain!
customer_reviews.author: Self-Diagnosed Amazonoholic

customer_reviews.title: Have been using Emjoi products for decades!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always asked about the pain. Yes, at first it does hurt - you're pulling each hair out as you would with tweezers. BUT if you were "blessed" LOL with healthy hair like me, it's a godsend. Since I've been using Emjoi epilators for so long, I can tell you that I have *much* less hair (like almost none) and what I have is softer and lighter. I'm a brunette so lighter is great! As Emjoi has come out with newer models, I've ended up moving from what I started with. The 72 tweezers on this one is great, as it does the job quicker. To the seller: It arrived a day EARLIER than promised - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Adena R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Review after Owning for Awhile
customer_reviews.text: I used to have an older version of this. I find this one MUCH harder to clean. You can't really get inside and clean all the hairs out. In addition, I find that this one burns your skin in sensitive areas because it heats up. Having it plug straight into the wall makes it a lot less practical. It ended up burning my under arms and I've basically had to go back to shaving my underarms because this device gets too hot to quickly. :( Works great on legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only stings a bit
customer_reviews.text: Was tired of paying 20-40 a month on razor cartridges, with the constant need to reco everything after only a few days. Hit up the legs (still kinda figuring out how to do my knees) and although I did get some redness and bumps (mostly on the front lower thighs above the knees - but I’d get that on occasion even with razors), but it seems to have cleared up okay. Works great, I only need to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hate to spend that much money for a gear to ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfull. Fits very well in the hand to were you don't drop it. The remington I had prior would slip out your hand when trying to maneuver it around back handed on sides or back of legs. Removes hair very well. Only wish the drive gears were metal. Trying to just glide it over the skin, in areas of unlevel, it hits and you can hear the gear give that eary im in a bind growl. Hate to spend that much money for a gear to strip out after just a couple months. But, is their anything you can buy now days that dont have plastic gears to break and you have to repurchase?
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!  This works!
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes some getting used to. The first time I thought I couldn't finish the job, but I got through it somehow. The second time was a little easier. By the fourth use it's old hat. No problem at all. Doesn't feel great, but isn't really painful anymore. And it keeps body hair away for a while, without all that stubble. Try it on your back, shoulders, your backside, anywhere a man might want to get rid of some body hair.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: It definitely does what it's suppose to do, but it is very painful! Some of my tattoos didn't hurt this bad. I used it on my happy trail and southern regions. Was feeling optimistic until I saw my skin the morning after. I've never had so many ingrown hairs in my life! 3 stars because it does remove the hair but the pain and the ingrown hairs aren't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Micaiah Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Reduced Coarse Hair on Legs, Arms, Underarms for this South Asian
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 years ago and I've been using it ever since. I use it on my legs, arms, and under arms. I'm South Asian so I have coarse hair but using this regularly reduced my hair from coarse to thin. I highly recommend this product as an alternative to shaving and waxing. Don't be scared of it. It can hurt a little bit at first but then your skin toughens up, especially as your hair thins out, and then it becomes easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Islam

customer_reviews.title: I really want to love this, but...
customer_reviews.text: When this epilator works, it's great. Quick to use as it has many tweezers and gets those very short hairs. However, this is the second one I've owned and both have failed within 18 months. Although the motor still works without issue, the nylon gears fail so it no longer turns the heads smoothly. This causes it to "jump" rather than glide over the skin, missing patches and if you're not holding the skin taught can catch that too. This is very disappointing as this item isn't cheap and I really want to love it as it's the best when it's new but when it fails after such a short time I'm not sure I can justify buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Izon

customer_reviews.title: Plastic gears wear out fairly quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we've had in our household and they work great. Unfortunately they have a design flaw that, in my opinion, makes them a poor purchase. The little plastic gears that run the tweezers are weak and break fairly easily. The first one lasted about a year, which isn't bad, but considering that the only thing wrong with it was the broken gear it could have been better. The second one lasted about 6 months. Same problem. Seems like for another $5 they could use aluminum or some other more rugged material for those little gears and spare their customers a lot of headaches. On to try the Braun....
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought over two years ago. Use about once a month on my underarms, upper lip and bikini area. Was wary about the underarms and bikini area, but have been extremely pleased with the results! Yes, there is some pain; but with frequent use it is hardly noticeable. I get the occasional ingrown hair on the bikini area, but they are much less common than with shaving. Hair has seemed to grow back finer in all areas. Unfortunately, I have to replace it because the head has stopped spinning. But I will definitely be purchasing another one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charity Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: Not so good. Epilating area too wide to adjust correctly to the contour of your legs, which slows epilation
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Emoji AP-18 Emagine epilator because I thought the dual opposed heads would mean much faster epilation but, in the end, the 2 rows of tweezers make the epilating area so wide that does not adjust properly to the contour of my legs so it does not pluck many hairs in one round. It was even slower than my old epilator (Philips HP6576 Satin Perfect Deluxe Epilator) because I had to go over the same area repeatedly to get it done.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: This product is perfect for someone who hates to shave like myself
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for someone who hates to shave like myself. I don't like to shave because hair grows back thicker and it seems to grow faster also, but I do not have that problem with the epilator. My hair grows back thin and I epilate maybe 1 to 2 times a month. I only use this on my legs btw. I have used it on my armpits, but I didn't like the bumps it left behind. I don't know how much of the bumps is my constitution or the epilator. Anyhow, I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Emma Park

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second type of epilator I have purchased. I like this one better because it comes with a little bag to keep everything together. It cooked with a brush, plastic cover to protect the tweezers when is not being used, a small, thin exfoliating loofah to use before you epilate, and a little brush to clean with afterwards. I have very thin hair so I have to go over it a few times but it does get them all out eventually. Seems a bit less painful than the one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Pgirl C.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using epilators for the past 10 years. Got this device back in 2013 due to positive reviews. I tried a few times and I went back to using my old, Panasonic one. This simply cuts the hair off rather than pulling it out as epilators supposed to do. As a result, you would need to attend to your legs more often. In addition, its incredibly noisy.
customer_reviews.author: CoastaGal

customer_reviews.title: Go slowly while using!
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these for over 10 years and it still works well! I just thought maybe I needed a new one to achieve a smoother treatment. This type of hair removal is so much better than shaving. My legs always feel soft and smooth and never have that stubbly feel!
customer_reviews.author: PTM

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so awesome💯 👌🏾😉😉😊 This is the best epilator I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so awesome💯 👌🏾😉😉😊 This is the best epilator I have ever used. Things just go so fast with this epilator. I have hirsutism. Hirsutism: medical condition involving excessive hair growth on women. My hirsutism is pretty mild I just use this for my chin. And omg this is like a life saver. 😊😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Ejiro

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Have to shave far less!. Yes I do still need a razor but only for quick touch ups and some fine hairs. It doesn't give super smooth close shave but I am also not having to complete shave again the next day or after I get a chill. I only wish it had a light built into it that would be super helpful. I only use on legs so far. The first type was a little painful but tolerable. I would suggest starting in middle of the calf til you get used to the feeling. Don't start by your ankle it hurts more there.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon P.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and way better than shaving
customer_reviews.text: First off, it hurts. You need to know that. I began lifting weights a while ago and was never a huge fan of my bodyhair. Once I had enough muscle to where I wouldnt look like a Nacho Libre if I removed it I bought this because shaving became annoying (and prickly). First few times left my skin red, but im sure that was just my skins shocked reaction to the hair being ripped out, results usually last me 1-2 weeks before I have to do it again
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Martin

customer_reviews.title: Best epilator I have used!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few epilators including the high end Braun, and this one kicks its a$$!! I’m a guy who likes to epilate my chest and stomach and this thing is the best epilator I have used. It is very efficient and gets the job done faster than any other epilator out of the previous 3 I have used!
customer_reviews.author: Matt P.

customer_reviews.title: There are better products
customer_reviews.text: I used a Satinelle for years. I needed to replace it. I was disappointed. I needed to go over the same area multiple times and some hairs remained.. I tried to remove a rogue facial hair. I went over the area several times. I wound up with irritated skin and the facial hair was till there. I used this for a couple of months. Finally, I got a another Satinelle. It does a much better job of removing unwanted hair.
customer_reviews.author: s_corpion

customer_reviews.title: Fixes the problem
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. It is strong and accurate. When I'm through using it, I don't have anything left to tweeze. The hair remains gone for quite a while between uses. I haven't had a problem with pain as long as I follow the directions. Cleans easily, and is easy to use. It can't be used in the shower, if that is where you need it, but for facial hair, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: LLL

customer_reviews.title: Great for one year
customer_reviews.text: It is bulky to hold. I really love this brand but it’s too pricey to buy a new one every year. It only lasts for a year. The head doesn’t work after that.
customer_reviews.author: big sis

customer_reviews.title: So not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I had so much hope for this guy. With double teeth and more power than my oldie Braun Silk Épil I thought I’d finally upgrade but the oldie does way better job. It’s faster but doesn’t give me the clean result. What I’ve found myself doing is I’ll use this epilator to get the majority of the hair and then switch to the Braun to pick up what it missed. My Braun also has a light in front which I realize helps so much. Completely not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Not as Efficient as I Had Hoped
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this thing. I was hoping with the many, many tweezers it would work amazingly. However, my other one with just 24 tweezers seems to have better results. It just doesn’t do a thorough job, and it takes a long time to really get your legs hair free.
customer_reviews.author: Scherra

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This Hass to be my absolute favorite products! Takes no time at all and grabs way more hair in each spin than my last one. I highly recommend this product for its quality and price !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the same epilator for years and thought it was time for an upgrade. My mistake... the Emjoi misses so many hairs. The head of the machine is too bulky. Not easy to clean. Cord is too short. No light. The only positive is that for the hairs it did pull, I didn't feel a thing. I'll be sticking with my cheap old Braun Silk Epil. It does a much better job.
customer_reviews.author: spicy_doll

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on June 18, 2018. Sadly, it just isn't working properly anymore. It makes a terrible Boise and doesn't grip any hair. This is quite disappointing, especially since I haven't had it a year yet. This is the second one I've purchased because the first one lasted about 3-years and worked amazingly until it died. I wish this one lasted just as long. Not sure why it stopped working in less than a year, but I think I may need to try a different one this time. The first one I owned I would've given 5 stars without hesitation, but this time it only gets 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this doesn't work very well. It just breaks most of the hairs off and leaves stubble. For areas with fine hair, it won't even grab them. I have a different brand epilator and that one pulls out the hairs from the roots, but this one, even with all those tweezers, doesn't do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very short life span!
customer_reviews.text: I must agree with a previous review. I too have been using an epilator for 20+ years. This one breaks down early. As she stated the little gear which I believe is now rubber not plastic wears down after the first 9-12 months therefore skipping constantly while using. SO aggravating! The price has come down 30% but still not worth 70$ !! Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Maria gmur

customer_reviews.title: not sure how I feel about this
customer_reviews.text: I was very hopeful when I received this. I carefully followed instructions and aside from a little pain the results weren't fantastic I didn't find my legs to be smooth as if they were freshly shaved and it takes a few tried to get the angle right. I'm still giving it a go what is true is that what hair is removed does not grow back quickly at all
customer_reviews.author: kirstin claire

customer_reviews.title: It hurts....
customer_reviews.text: It hasn't stopped hurting after repeated use, like some reviewer suggested. Still hurts me like hell.... couldn't complete the use- left using it half way.... My Panasonic hair remover wet/dry was perfect.... Will replace this with the Panasonic soon (it's way too cheaper plus I can use it in shower as well as no cords to worry about).
customer_reviews.author: Deekay

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Results!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this epilator! I was reluctant to buy this type of item, as I spent a lot of money on one many years ago and dreaded using it, because it was pretty painful. I was astonished by the minimal discomfort, speed and efficiency of the Emjoi AP-18 when I tried it for the first time, yesterday. The results were amazing and I can highly recommend this product. The only con to report is the shipping time seemed rather lengthy, but then I'm completely spoiled by Amazon Prime's free two day delivery.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Emoji AP-18 stopped working after 16 months
customer_reviews.text: Emjoi AP-18 Emagine Dual Opposed 72 Tweezer Head Epilator did a fair job for me. I would have to make multiple passes, in all directions, to get all the hair under my arms. Even then, I usually had to grab one or two with a tweezer. I never used it on my legs. I would use it on my upper lip and on my cheeks right under my "side burns". I would have given it a better star rating, but unfortunately it stopped working at just over a year. I contacted the manufacturer and they said it was out of warranty. My previous Emjoi lasted for almost 10 years. So this is pretty disappointing for me, given the price.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing a "promotional" from EpiSlim+ through their website buybabysmooth dot com (p.s. never ever buy one from them), I was hesitant to try another epilator. This one exceeded my expectations, and I am glad I purchased. While I am not over the pain of epilating, I do find this one to be efficient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jess W

customer_reviews.title: Emjoi Company
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6 months ago and it's broke now. The gear that turns the tweezers is plastic. Now it will not turn the tweezers because a toothe broke in the gear. I liked it when it worked. It just did not last. I called the Emjoi company in New York. They were wonderful. They are mailing me a replacement tweezer free of charge. It's still under warranty. Yes, I do recommend this product. I does the job. Great customer service from Emjoi.com. The Amazon store I bought this from is Shave Now. They offer refund or replacement for one month after purchase. So, I did not contact them since it had been 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: it would be great if they lasted more than a year
customer_reviews.text: Well after a little more than a year of use, this epilator has stopped working. The head, which is detachable, is grinding and not moving even though the motor is working. I went to emjoi's wesite where you can buy a new head and they are constantly out of stock. So....I was using my backup- an emjoi soft caress and those gears stopped working also. I can getbit spinning but as soon as it touches something, it stops. With as expensive as these things are, it would be great if they lasted more than a year. Emjoi needs to step up their quality to what it was a few years back.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Less pain, more effective
customer_reviews.text: I have used an epilator for many years, and this is my third. Wish it could have been my first! Although a bit noisy, this is the best of all. It truly extracts the hairs in one swipe, and hurts far less than others have. I use this on face and underarms.
customer_reviews.author: gadinger

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself some time and pain with this product !
customer_reviews.text: The Emjoi AP-18 Emagine Dual Opposed 72 Tweezer Head Epilator is the best epilator I have ever used ! 1st great thing is that It takes half the time to do my legs with the 72 Tweezer Head, hence half the pain and frustration. 2nd awesome thing is that the Dual Opposed Head pick up the hairs from all directions of growth, instead of having to go over the same spot multiple times causing more irritation. 3rd fantastic thing is that this is not a cordless epilator, requiring it to be plugged in, using more power, for faster moving tweezers. once again, getting the job done faster while saving us some of the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Simona Luiza

customer_reviews.title: Breaks hairs and broke after using about ten times over 4 years
customer_reviews.text: After I bought this I didn’t use it very often because it seemed to break the hairs in half rather than pull them out from the roots. I still had my old $30 Phillips from Walgreens and that thing worked way better—didn’t break the hair. Finally, after 4 years the Phillips broke and I started using this and just dealing with the broken hairs. After using about 10 times the motor gave out and can’t turn the tweezers anymore. This this was so expensive and now I can’t even return it because it’s been so long.
customer_reviews.author: Ankaa

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in summer of 2016 and it lasted me 2 years (I used it probably once a week on average). It's a good epilator, works well and all. Obviously, I'd prefer if the motor to last more than 2 years, but worth it overall. The number of tweezers is great for catching all the hairs in fewer passes.
customer_reviews.author: sbelt

customer_reviews.title: It was good while it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for 3 years and it worked beautifully on high speed, until it started breaking hairs instead of pulling them, therefore the hair would grow more often. Also, one time as I was using it, on of the pins of the inner wheel broke so the epilator would stop working as soon as it touched the skin, making it impossible to use anymore...
customer_reviews.author: A Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Best epilady I've used so far (30 years)
customer_reviews.text: I previously had an older version of this product. It lasted me around 10 years. I love the newer version, it has a wider head that covers a larger area and is a lot smoother for use on my underarms than the smaller base the old one had. I've been using an epilady for over 30 years and this one is the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is soo bad..
customer_reviews.text: it is soo bad.... hated it... gave me more ingrows than ever and is not powerful at all.. very slow to do the job... have to go through the same area so many times... went back to my old 20 dollars satinelle that gives me very good results
customer_reviews.author: Valentina L.

customer_reviews.title: Great until it broke in 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this epilator so much for the first three months. It is powerful and quick and after a few uses, it felt more like a nice massage than painful hair removal. Unfortunately, around 2 1/2 months in it began making weird grinding sounds and the tweezers kept jamming until it completely quit working. I was quite disappointed as I bought the product hoping to save money on hair removal supplies. For such a short life span it is definitely not worth the price. Hopefully, others have had better luck. Apart from this major flaw it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B.

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but hurts like a mother!! Even when you think you are done it grabs all the baby small hairs that you didn't see! I think if I keep using it I'll get used to it. But be prepared for your first time. I had a couple beers with me the first time. Also if you gave sensitive skin you will get red and possibly bumpy and itchy after. I recommend your favorite lotion skin soother after.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: but I am so glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many epilators and they never worked as expected so I wasn't expecting much from the Emjoi AP-18. I was hesitant to purchase because of the price that was a little to high for me, but I am so glad that I did. This product is by far the best! I love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: jadinne fangman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of shaving and waxing was to messy so I decided to do some research on a epilator. I came across this one at a decent price which was one of the top ones. The first time I used it I was very nervous about all the pain some people had that I read or saw. For me there wasn't really any pain felt like needles pricking me, also it was pretty fast, so I'll just say it was well worth the money and I love it and will not go back to shaving. Oh it's been about 3 weeks since I've had to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this it does a great job with hair removal and the light is amazing it does every little hair you missed I love this one so much I have the other two that didn't ha she lights to friends of mine who just wanted to see if they could handle the pain before they went ahead and bought their own I would highly recommend this to anyone who hates shaving all the time with this I shave every other week sometimes three weeks
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I turned it on it sounded off. It was so, so loud. Still, I was excited to have a new epilator with more tweezers. I don't even know what my old epilator was- bought it at HEB for 40 bucks 2 years ago. Anyway, in addition to being loud, this left my armpits raw but left the hair. I expected so much more for the price. I'm returning it- it's not even usable.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Epilating is definitely painful if you've never waxed before, but if you have, then I highly recommend buying this product to save you money on waxing. It's effective and can be used basically anywhere on the body. Only downside is mild pain and you have to be sure to exfoliate or you will be more prone to ingrown hairs. I love this epilator, it's saved me so much money from expensive waxing visits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used an older version for years, but this new version is much better. I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Hurts like an SOB the first couple of times that you use it. But after that it's not bad at all. I use it on my arms regularly and am planning to get my legs used to it so I don't have to shave. It seriously works great! It is a quality machine. I also like the fact that it plugs in so I'm not changing the batteries constantly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long.
customer_reviews.text: This device stopped working after only a few months :( I think the problem is with the dual twizer. I don't know what to do. I can't find a way to contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Label Free

customer_reviews.title: decent if you want an epilator
customer_reviews.text: I tried this epilator (I have not used other models or brands) because shaving can be annoying. It works pretty well, but be prepared to clean up a lot of little hairs. Unfortunately, it is time-consuming to use as it takes several passes to remove all hair, and forget trying to use it on soft/cushy areas of skin--it will pull your skin into the unit. I went back to shaving because the abrasiveness of the process really irritated my skin, and when my hair grew back it hurt (for some reason it was more prickly?? which doesn't make sense.)
customer_reviews.author: JWolf

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It's too expensive for quality. It doesn't pick up the short hair. I bought a Remington brand from Walmart half of the price but works a lot better and less noise.
customer_reviews.author: Yaongyi Jibsa

customer_reviews.title: Better, faster hair removal
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this type of a hair removing system for years. This new one is the best yet. Removes hair faster than any of the others ones I've used. It has a longer cord and that is a plus. Love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Chico

customer_reviews.title: My Preference!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Emjoi epilators. I just dropped and broke my first one, so I needed this one to replace it. I hope to never have to use any other hair removal again. It's as close to being painless as can be. I love that, and that it only needs done every several weeks! I saw on some other reviews there were remarks on pain at first...my recommendation, as I had done myself, is to "wax" one time, and then begin with the epilator. Any hair that returns after a wax is slower, and there aren't so many hairs to pull at the same time. I also use it under arms, and all around the bikini area.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hetrick

customer_reviews.title: Significantly effective to waxing and daily shaving for cosmetic depilation
customer_reviews.text: Any device with effective hair removal or depilating capabilities is an alternative to waxing, shaving or the most permanent hair removal process, but costly in time and money, electrolysis. The Enjoi is a very effective and minimally painful piece of machinery that does what it says it will do and it will and can effortlessly, create a non-hirsute epithelial surface in little time and with minimal effort. For anyone who requires or desires efficacious diplation, the Emjoi product is one I would unquestionably endorse.
customer_reviews.author: Lancelot

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a number of Emjoi epilators over the years. All have had the tweezer head design, though my previous ones were gold plated (no idea why). This particular model basically has two heads and the tweezers go opposite directions. That seemed like a good plan. However, I've found that the head is too big to use effectively anywhere but my legs and arms. So if you're looking for something for the underarm or bikini areas, this is not it. Also, my previous models were able to remove very short hair. That does not seem to be the case with this one. Overall I'm disappointed. I will say that this is the least painful epilator I've ever used though!
customer_reviews.author: Jillyn

customer_reviews.title: NOT recommending.
customer_reviews.text: It is very loud, bulky anf painful. It must be held at just the righy angle to work at all. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this epilator, best purchase ever, it does a smooth "pluck"??, so much longer lasting then a shaver. I did not find it too painful on my legs, a little discomfort the first few moments, then nothing really, I did shower and use a loofah before I used the epilator. I have not used it anywhere else yet.
customer_reviews.author: Quinton

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient and comfortable epilator
customer_reviews.text: I'm not new to epilation. Prior to this I was a die hard fan of the Philips Satin Perfect epilator. Based on recommendations though. I decided to give this one a try. The low price made me nervous.. (More expensive is better, right??) I can safely say I won't go back to the Philips Epilator again. It was a great epilator, but this one is far superior. The Emjoi AP-18 is the most effective and comfortable epilator I've ever used. The dual heads are extremely efficient and my skin isn't piched or pulled. One pass yields as much hair as 2 or 3 passes on my old epilator. It's also somewhat quiet. (Comparatively speaking)
customer_reviews.author: MFamTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Epilator
customer_reviews.text: This is now my second one. My first one broke after 4 years. It works like it should and is easy to pop the head off and clean. I prefer a plug in version since it won't lose a charge during hair removal.
customer_reviews.author: It's_Me

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very first epilator I have ever owned and I am so pleased I was definitely completely terrified to use it but after a few minutes you don't feel the pain anymore. I couldn't be happier to be hair free for as long as this provides along with the growth inhibiting cream. That is must with the epilator but after you continue use you will not see as many hairs grow back as before so its completely wonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Great epilator for Coarse hair.
customer_reviews.text: You need this, buy one, it will make your life easier. I have very course hair, I use it for my arms, underarms, legs. It serves its purpose. For the face I use something gentler, and smaller epilator, because this irritates the sensitive skin on my face.
customer_reviews.author: dmr

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with quality
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased one of these and after 4 months of use the plastic gear in the tweezer head stripped out. I thought that perhaps it was my fault - maybe I had applied too much pressure while using it so I ordered another one. I have been GENTLY using the new one since May and the plastic gear once again stripped. These are a piece of expensive junk and I do not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: tom thompson

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an optimal emoji that I have owned for years and thought I needed a new one. The new one did not remove hair as effectively as my older model. It broke within 3 months! I am back to using my old one.
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: Leads to in-grown hair and stubble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since my previous epilator had got old and newer technology and improved products are in the market. Initially I thought this product was working, but that was the because of the effectiveness of the old epilator. Over time, this gadget has only led to ingrown hair, does not take off the growth, is extremely hard to hold and is useless. Since the time to return it is passed, I have to just trash it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She suffers from dark colored facial hair and it's so painful to remove
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She suffers from dark colored facial hair and it's so painful to remove. This unit is an upgrade to the one we bought maybe 10 years ago (same maker). This unit is some less painful, which is great given they all hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Just another Jo(anna)

customer_reviews.title: GET PLUCKED!
customer_reviews.text: The EMJOI AP-18 is the Ferrari of the Epilator world. The dual opposing heads doing the job twice as fast as the single-head I'd owned by another manufacturer, it's like getting two race cars for the price of one. Delightfully lightweight, the plug-in operation is better than dealing with the undue heaviness of a rechargeable battery. My legs, left razor-blade smooth in record time, I kept turning around, half expecting the cops to pull me over for speeding.
customer_reviews.author: Marja Healy

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!!! I get the results of waxing without the price! It sounds a little intense when you first turn it on and the first use is a little scary. But I've been using it for over 6 months now and I don't know what I ever did without it. I only have to use it once a week to stay silky smooth. Plus once you get used to the sensation it's virtually painless (certainly a lot less painful than waxing).
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Adams

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth my money.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for under arms I’m too chicken to use on my face,legs or anywhere else. It’s lasted me many years and still going strong. I try to use it quite frequently. Saved me from going through razors like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Briauna

customer_reviews.title: The Bomb, the best I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is fantastically efficient, and so easy to use, I love it, ok, you have to use the cord, but it is long, flexible and I will never buy any other machine
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Luehman

customer_reviews.title: IT'S OK...
customer_reviews.text: I GAVE AWAY MY PREVIOUS EPILATOR (BASIC PHILLIPS) BECAUSE I WAS SURE IF I GOT ONE WITH MORE TWEZZERS IT WOULD DO THE JOB FASTER. I WAS WRONG... I ENDED UP PAYING MORE MONEY FOR THIS EMJOI AND NOW I WOULD GO BACK TO MY BASIC EPILATOR IN A HEART BEAT. THIS EMJOI IS OKAY FOR THICKER HAIR, BUT WHEN IT IS THIN (LIKE MINE IN MY LEGS), THE EPILATOR DOESN'T PULL THEM OUT FROM THE ROOT BUT CUTS THEM.. REALLY FRUSTRATING.. I GOT THIS ONE BY MAIL (I DON'T LIVE IN THE US) SO ITS NOT LIKE I CAN RETURN IT...
customer_reviews.author: tefogv

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Don't buy it. I've had it for about 6 months and it is the worst epilator I have ever used. I've used epilators since my teens and have probably been through 4-5 epilators. This one is by far the worst. It gets stuck constantly and makes a horrible shrieking noise and it can barely pluck my fine hairs. I wish I could return it, but it's past the return date. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: H.A.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I have been using depilatory for ten years and this one is light yet powerful. I have two or three hairs in each pore so shaving only makes things worse, have stubble & grow back faster. After using this for so many years i actually have places where the hair is not growing anymore without doing laser treatments. This is just as good as waxing, expect in the hard to reach places so i use it mostly for underarms and the lower half of my leg. I have tried it on thighs too but too hard to do the back of my thighs or bikini.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: My rechargeable Braun (Silk-9) epliator died after a year of use and I was really upset. I thought a corded option would be better for me...I don't think this does a better job than my old one and it has more tweezers. I think if I'd have gotten this one first I'd be happy with it though.
customer_reviews.author: E.Krueger

customer_reviews.title: It works..give it time.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I've been epilating for 5 years I wish I would have know about when I was younger. Your hair will eventually grow out finer and less. I wish I had a before picture of my legs. Before epilation I would have to save daily and my whole legs are full of hair. Picture shows a month since my last epilation and hair is scarce. The only reason for a 4 is the unit has too be plugged in, although it states it can be use cordless, you can't since battery does not charge.
customer_reviews.author: monica hong

customer_reviews.title: Best epilator yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this epilator after 10 years of owning a Braun Silkepil Eversoft model. If you're a seasoned epilator, this is the one for you. This packs some serious power and does quick work of the legs, arms, underarms and bikini area. I actually looked forward to epilating, I usually epilate once a week to get the entire cycle. The key to smooth epilated skin is exfoliation, exfoliation, exfoliation; so make sure you do that everyday after you epilate to prevent ingrown hairs. I've used it for two weeks so far on every part of my body and I am sold. **********************CONS************************************ It does not come with a shaver/trimmer head, for the cost I would have expected that too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bhowmik

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason why so many LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I tried an epilady back when they first came out, I was in Jr High and it was way too painful. I haven't tried anything like it until the Emjoi eMagine and I really, really love it. I've only done my arms, so far. It honestly feels exactly like getting a tattoo. (I have many) I finished my arms about thirty minutes ago and now my skin is just softly tingly. It's hard to explain. But, I know it'll hurt less and less the more I use it. All in all, I'm really happy with the results. It even plucked every one of my tiny invisible hairs on my upper arms. It's truly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: TMooreKajiwara

customer_reviews.title: RUN! DO NOT BUY, DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: This company, 'shave now', is selling defective epilators, as indicated by many reviews, and does not stand behind them or work with the customer to remedy the problem. I used mine less than 10 times, it simply will not turn on now, so it is useless. $60 for what is now a paperweight. I should have listened to the bad reviews, since my experience has proved them all correct. Shop with someone who cares about the customer instead of 'shave now'.
customer_reviews.author: Madcapzany

customer_reviews.title: Saved money and time
customer_reviews.text: I love the machine!!!! My legs and face are nice and smooth. I used to wax and this is definitely a money saver. I seriously save money and time, driving to the spa to get wax or the store to buy wax, a warmer, stripes oh no!! What a nightmare I love the epilator and strongly recommend omens it. And yes is going to hurt then you will tolerate the pain. Since waxing causes pain too, I am used too. But for people changing from razor to an epilator it's going to hurt more than usual since the hair might be very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over all its a good product but if you dont have a high pain ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to pass over small areas multiple times to get a clean grab. Does grab the hair by the root mostly sometimes it cuts it depending on what direction youre going. Over all its a good product but if you dont have a high pain tolarence i find it easier to go get my legs and other areas waxed by a professional i was too scared to try my arm pits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have used it twice so far on my legs and chin area. I actually did not find it painful for the most part. Legs were very smooth afterwards. I made sure I exfoliated the night before with a scrub. I probably will not use in chin again because I developed two small pimples there after and I don't usually get pimples. Also, I wish the cord was a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I usually shave my legs once a week, twice during the summer months. I tried this as soon as I got it and, other than a few strays that I missed, my legs have been hair-free for a few weeks. Yes, it stings at first but was not near as bad as I was expecting. I would highly recommend this epilator and am very glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective epilator - powerful tool!
customer_reviews.text: The 72 tweezers definitely make epilating much faster than a standard machine. With that said, the plastic parts between the gears does concern me for long-term use but so far, it has been working well with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Liu

customer_reviews.title: no pain no gain
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I can say about how painful this thing is in the beginning that hasn't been said, so let's just get that out of the way. It does get better after a few uses, I promise! I have hair issues, and I cannot tolerate stubble!! This thing has been a life saver. I use it everywhere. I touch up my legs maybe once a week, facial area once every couple of weeks, underarms once a month but I stay on top of my bikini like because I absolutely cannot tolerate stubble there. Hair grows back thinner and much more manageable. I looooovvveeee this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Item stopped working in less than a month. I would not recommend this at all
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it was a good thing to anticipate the pain coz REALLY
customer_reviews.text: OMG Ladies! BUY this product NOW! I am an brown skin girl with thick hair and shaving made my underarm so dark and bumpy. I bought this product although i was very nervous reading all the comments on the internet about pain. Maybe it was a good thing to anticipate the pain coz REALLY, this doesn't hurt at all. I mean yes, it yanks out the hair, and you can feel it, but it is very tolerable. Cleared my underarm in 3 passes and made me so happy. I am never going back to shaving those pits again. I'm so glad i bought this, and you should too!
customer_reviews.author: Neha

product_meta.title: Emjoi AP-18 Emagine Dual Opposed 72 Tweezer Head Epilator
product_meta.description:
Emjoi emagine epilator cordless. 72 tweezers – the most on the market – remove the majority of hair the first time, saving time and possible skin irritation by reducing the number of passes required to achieve smooth skin. each disc set contains one fixed disk and two that open and close, to gently assist in skin stretching and increase comfort. 17mm disc opening – the optimal radius to effectively remove hair. patented glide technology lifts up and removes hair by gliding the tweezer discs over the skin with less irritation. dual-opposed heads hold the skin taut and are more comfortable than other epilators. each set of dual-opposed head is staggered to cover more surface area and grasp all the hair the first time. middle lifting fingers prepare hair for removal by lifting flat and short hair and decreasing the possibility of ingrown hair. removes hair from the root, leaving skin smooth for up to six weeks. silver ion technology provides antimicrobial protection. curved shape is designed to hug the curves of the body. ergonomically engineered handle is balanced in your hand and is easy to hold and maneuver all over the body. removes hair as short as 0.5mm right from the root. gentle enough to remove delicate facial hair on the upper lip and chin. great for removing hair on the legs, bikini line and underarms. dual speed control. designed for corded and cordless operation.

AMAZON.COM
Get professional results at home with the Emjoi AP-18 Emagine Dual Opposed 72 Tweezer Head Epilator. Gentle, efficient, and effective, this compact hair remover offers breakthrough technology and a curved shape designed to hug your body's natural curves. It works quickly, catching hair in the first pass, so you're left with nothing but soft, smooth skin.

 



Emjoi AP-18 Emagine Dual Epilator provides gentle and effective hair removal. View larger. 

72 tweezer heads remove hair without the need for multiple passes. View larger. 72 Tweezer Heads For Fast, Long-Lasting Results
The Emagine features 72 tweezer heads that remove hair without the need for multiple passes. One fixed tweezer disc works together with two that open and close, capturing every last hair, while a 17-millimeter disk opening creates the optimal radius to effectively remove any lingering strands. In addition, the Emjoi's patented "Glide Technology" lifts up the hair and enables the tweezers to skate over the skin, helping to minimize irritation. You'll enjoy long-lasting results for up to six weeks. Antimicrobial Protection
Designed to pamper your skin and keep you safe from infection, the Emagine is the first epilator in the world to offer Silver Ion Technology to provide antimicrobial protection for a safe, healthy hair-removal experience.

 Exclusive Technology Helps Prevent Ingrown Hairs
The Emagine features innovative technology you won't find in any other epilator. First, dual opposed staggered heads allow the Emagine to cover more surface area while grasping and removing the hair. And to reduce the chance of ingrown hairs, the Emagine boasts exclusive "lifting fingers" that lift flat and short hairs--which other hair removal systems often miss--for easy, even epilation. In fact, this handy tool removes hair from the root as short as 0.5 millimeters.

 User-Friendly Operation
The Emagine is user-friendly and comfortable to use, thanks to an ergonomically engineered handle that balances in your hand and is easy to maneuver all over your body. It's versatile and gentle enough to remove delicate facial hair on the upper lip and chin, and is also great for removing hair on the legs, bikini line, and underarms. Dual speed control lets you customize each experience, and convenient, plug-in operation means you won't have to worry about replacing a battery.

 The Emagine also comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee.
feature_bullets: Cord/cordless​ - This item is corded only
Dual speed control, is also cordless and rechargeable​ - This item is corded and NOT rechargeable.
